ygData.subject: Re: quests?
ygData.msgSnippet: no, ur not dreaming...  at least it s not a unique dream :) I wish they would add more robes for lvl 10-25 (some cool ones specific to wizards or caster
ygData.messageBody:
no, ur not dreaming... at least it's not a unique dream :)

I wish they would add more robes for lvl 10-25 (some cool ones specific to
wizards or caster only... and not the thurm/goss robes... those suck) and
add more magical armor (not jewelery, but legs, arms, feet, hands, cape,
etc...) for casting classes only between lvl 10-25. whether they're found
on NPC's, through quests, named mobs, etc... just give us something to look
for other than woven. sure, once we all hit 30+, we can start questing for
some of those cool and rare items we see selling on ebay for gobs of cash,
but until then, we don't really have much to look forward to. here is a
list of INT/Mana items that i have obtained from lvl 15 to about lvl 22...
none through quests though.

RTS (2h staff, +5 Mana +5 HP)
Golden Ear Stud x2 (+3 INT)
Polished Bone Hoop (+10 Mana)
Black Iron Medallion (+3 INT +3 WIS)
Gold Star Necklace (+4 INT -- Jeweler)
Ruby Pendant (+1 INT)
Ivory Bracelet (+20 Mana +3 AGI)
Jade Electrum Bracelet (+10 Mana +10 HP -- Jeweler)
Savants Cap (+3 INT +3 WIS)
Star Rose Engagement Ring x2 (+2 INT -- Jeweler)
Skull of J`hen Tra (+20 Mana +3 Sv Magic)

sinlaru


-----Original Message-----
From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 11:09 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] quests?


>From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
>Is it just me or is this list slowing down lately? :)
>
>In the interest of getting some discussion going again, anybody know any
>good mid-level quests suitable for 20ish Wizards? Things have been slowing
>down for good 'ol LimDul lately and I'm looking around for something else
to
>do besides all the senseless killing.
>
>Sometimes I wish Verant had more items for us to find...we all know the
>items everyone wants (ie. Observer Robe/Staff, Shimmering Orb, etc) Too
>bad there weren't enough variety of items so that we don't have to all camp
>for the same things. Imagine if there were several different varieties of
>Observer robes or Different colors of Orbs? Maybe just adjust the stats
just
>a fraction to allow for different combinations. It's a shame everyone has
>to keep butting heads looking for the same things....only to find you look
>like everyone else once you get it. :( I would think the above types of
>changes wouldn't drastically be difficult under the current game
>engine...nor would they ruin game balance...or would they?
>
>I can see their rationale in limiting "rare" items to only 1 NPC. But
>placed in the perspective of 1500 on a server, that poor NPC is typically
>going to be camped by everyone who wants that item. It would be nice to
>provide other items that one might choose that would work in lieu of
camping
>for days for an item.
>
>*sigh* Just dreaming to myself. ;)
>
>-- Lim'Dul
>Veeshan
>
>
